property.name: Enable application debug
property.description:
This option determines if debug information in the application should be displayed.

Specific debug information contained in the source code files can be displayed by editing headset_debug.h.

property.name: Add SD card support
property.description: This option is used to enable SD card support.

property.name: Use configurable LEDs
property.description:
This option determines if the LEDs should be configurable through PS Keys.

Disabling this feature can save memory and code size but then any LED changes will need to be made by modifying headset_flash_led_manager.c.

property.name: Enable profiling debug
property.description: This option determines if debug information about memory and timings should be displayed.
